archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1395
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Modify service characteristics from BSS, example Internet bandwidth/speed characteristics based non-payment triggers. Example, change Internet speed to a lower bandwidth and once account has been paid then modify the bandwidth to the original value.

properties.value: Mobile - no plan Fix - limit speed / disconnect VFNZ AP: How to handle situation when customer has multiple services/products and for example pays for mobile subscription and for fix subscription not

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
